section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Consultative Forum on EU External Aviation Policy#E03519#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3519#Member#C
membership:
ASL Aviation Group comprising of six European airlines: 
 
ASL Airlines Ireland 
ASL Airlines Belgium 
ASL Airlines France 
ASL Airlines Spain 
ASL Airlines Switzerland 
ASL Airlines Hungry 
 
Cargolux Group comprising of two European cargo airlines: 
 
Cargolux – licenced in Luxembourg 
Cargolux Italia – licenced in Italy 
 
DHL Express is an air express operator with operations in all countries across Europe and across the globe.  In Europe it comprises of two cargo airlines: 
 
European Air Transport Leipzig GmbH – licenced in Germany 
DHL Air Limited – licenced in the UK
